mapper.select: select a.isnew,a.prod_id,a.ecode,c.style as prod_style,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_equipment_store f on a.ecode=f.ecode where a.ecode=#{ecode} and f.store_id=#{store_id}
select a.* from ems_adjust a where (a.status='carry' or a.status='partin') and a.str_in_id in (select store_id from sys_userstore c where c.user_id=#{user_id} and c.edit='Y')

select f.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.id as prod_id,c.name as prod_name,c.style as prod_style,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_adjustlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode where f.adjust_id=#{adjust_id}
select f.*,a.prod_id from ems_equipment a inner join ems_adjustlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode where f.adjust_id=#{adjust_id} and f.adjustListStatus='in'

select a.* from ems_adjust a where (a.returnstatus='nonereturn' or a.returnstatus='partreturn') and a.adjustType='borrow' and a.str_out_id in (select store_id from sys_userstore c where c.user_id=#{user_id} and c.look='Y')
